en-US.summary: AWS PUG provides information from the Amazon Web Services Portsmouth User Group
examplePhrases: Alexa ask AWS PUG when is the next meetup
Alexa ask AWS PUG what is AWS PUG
en-US.name: aws pug
en-US.description: AWS PUG provides information from the Amazon Web Services Portsmouth User Group. Currently this skill allows users to ask about future events and get information about AWS PUG. Stay tuned for future updates.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Invoke the skill by saying Alexa, Open AWS PUG
